name: simple-traces
description: A lightweight LLM tracing tool with support for SQLite or PostgreSQL

scripts.build-backend: mkdir -p src/simple-traces/backend/frontend && cp -r src/simple-traces/frontend/dist src/simple-traces/backend/frontend/dist && cd src/simple-traces/backend && go build -o ../../../simple-traces .
scripts.build-all: npm run install-frontend && npm run build && npm run build-backend
